title: Lunar Revel Skins!! (and Tristana Update)
body:
Oh boy these upcoming skins are amazing: http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/01/113-pbe-update.html#more

I finally have some interest in Tris: http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/01/champion-update-tristana.html#more


SO MACH HYPE

replies.body: Omg that Jinx skin :D My wallet is ready
I am not really a fan of any of the skins (but am glad Jinx is getting one). However the Tristana update is amazing.
Since Tristana is a yordle, and Tristana is gettign a VU, does that mean that Teemo will be getting a VU soon?
